'''Sumeru Photographer of Teyvat''' is a Web [[Event]] in [[Version 3.0]].

==Event Duration==
* August 26, 2022 – September 23, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* Results and Winners List Announcement:
** The list of winners will be updated in this event post on October 13, 2022. Winners will be notified via forum messages, please stay tuned for official announcements.

==Event Details==
===Week 1: Sumeru's Special Creatures===
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/7215715
* Event Duration:
** August 26, 2022 – September 2, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** Zaytun Peach, Shaggy Sumpter Beast, Dendro Fungus... What animals, plants, or characteristic Sumeru creatures have Travelers found in Sumeru?<br>Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post and share your photos of "Sumeru's Special Creatures"! 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×300 each.

===Week 2: Exploring the Sumeru Map===
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/7913186
* Event Duration:
** September 2, 2022 – September 9, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** What are the new puzzles in Sumeru? Where are the unexpected places that hide treasure chests? Come share them with us~
** Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post and share your photos of "Exploring the Sumeru Map"! 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×300 each.

===Week 3: The Fascinating Dendro Element===
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/8553048
* Event Duration:
** September 8, 2022 – September 16, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** We have finally arrived in Sumeru where the Dendro element can be seen everywhere! Dendro reactions are so fascinating, they deserve to be immortalized in a photo!
** Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post and share your photos of "Sumeru's Dendro Element"! 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×300 each.

===Week 4: Gathering in Sumeru City===
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/8870533
* Event Duration:
** September 15, 2022 – September 22, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** I heard that Sumeru City is a must-visit after arriving in Sumeru~
** To commemorate your visit, you can share in the comments section of this post a photo of Sumeru City. 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted to receive Primogems ×100 each.

==Notes==
# Please go to My Information > Information Management > Game Information Management > Genshin Impact to fill in your Genshin Impact UID ahead of time. If winning Travelers have not filled in their UID after the results are announced, they will be deemed to have forfeited their Primogems reward.
# Each user has only one chance to win a prize in each event. The results of the two events are independent of each other.
# The following situations will be considered invalid participation:
## The content of the post violates Community Rules, or plagiarized, or misappropriated content from other authors.
## Publishing content unrelated to the theme of the event, content that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game and its characters.
# After the list of winners is announced, if the winner deletes the post of the winning work, the winner will be deemed to have voluntarily forfeited their prize.
# Each HoYoLAB account can win only one merchandise prize during the event.
